EmailTemplate.subject: Get the VMTurbo Vedi Pack & 20% Off
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pre-VMworld Exclusive Offer: Purchase VMTurbo by August 15th, and get the VMTURBO VEDI PACK:
1) Limited Edition VMT Swag Bundle, including an embroidered Green Circle Community hoodie
2) Personalized video of your VMT sales rep doing a majestic Vedi dance
3) 20% OFF VMTurbo List Price (cannot be combined with any other offer. Minimum 20 CPU licenses to qualify.)
<mailto:{{Lead.Lead Owner First Name}}.{{Lead.Lead Owner Last Name}}@vmturbo.com?subject=I Am A Vedi, Like My Father Before Me (20 Percent Off Please)> Learn More <mailto:{{Lead.Lead Owner First Name}}.{{Lead.Lead Owner Last Name}}@vmturbo.com?subject=I Am A Vedi, Like My Father Before Me (20 Percent Off Please)> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
